alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 30 at 5:49AM EDT until October 01 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Connecticut... Housatonic River At Gaylordsville affecting Litchfield County. Housatonic River At Stevenson Dam affecting Fairfield and New Haven Counties. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River at Stevenson Dam. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Moderate flood stage with numerous homes in the Maples area of Shelton affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:30 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 15.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning and continue falling to 8.2 feet early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Stevenson Dam Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Sat 5 am: 15.3 Forecast: Sat 8 am 14.4 Sat 2 pm 13.2 Sat 8 pm 12.4 Sun 2 am 11.7 Sun 8 am 11.2 Sun 2 pm 10.6 Sun 8 pm 10.1 Mon 2 am 9.7 Mon 8 am 9.4 Mon 2 pm 9.0 Mon 8 pm 8.5 Tue 2 am 8.2 &&
